ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

709 A.2d 904
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Charles C. GEHMAN, Appellant.

Argued Feb. 5, 1998.
